import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, NavbarToggler, Collapse, NavItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, DropdownItem} from 'reactstrap'; import {Header as FullPageHeader} from 'react-fullpage'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './styles.css'; class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isNavOpen: false, isModalOpen: false }; this.toggleNav = this.toggleNav.bind(this); } toggleNav() { this.setState({ isNavOpen: !this.state.isNavOpen }); } render() { return(
Home About Specialties Portfolio Skills Education Clients Contact Code ReactJS AngularJS Site Open edX Site Machine Learning Wordpress Site Ecommerce Site Pure HTML Bootstrap Me on Github My Blog
); } } export default Header;
